bibl.title: Imaging of Papyri: A Strategic View. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) project. - Describes the strategic considerations on which the project is based and the advantages of provinding on-line images of original papyri from several different collections.

bibl.title: Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents

bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Imaging of Papyri: A Strategic View. Avec résumé en anglais.
A.K. BOWMAN and Marilyn DEEGAN (Edd.), Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents = Literary & Linguistic Computing 12 (1997) No. 3, pp. 153-154.

The Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) project. - Describes the strategic considerations on which the project is based and the advantages of provinding on-line images of original papyri from several different collections.
